rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issues you raise are not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. The cleaning of shops and supermarkets is a matter for those individual business, not the UK Government or Parliament. Road cleaning is a matter for local authorities. 

Guidance for people with confirmed or possible coronavirus (COVID-19) infection is being developed by Public Health England, and decisions about medical advice are a matter for medical professionals and the NHS.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
